creator: Kinānī, ʻAbd al-ʻAzīz ibn Yaḥyá, d. 854 or 5.
title: Kitāb al-ḥaydah
alternativeTitle: Ḥaydah wa-al-iʻtidhār fī al-radd ʾalá man qāla bi-khalq al-Qurʾān
description: Account of a disputation with Bishr ibn Ghayāth al-Marīsī, before the caliph al-Maʾmūn, on the question whether the Koran was created.
Available on microfilm from Beinecke Rare Book and Manuscript Library, Yale University
titleStatement: Kitāb al-ḥaydah / li-ʻAbd al-ʻAzīz al-Kinānī al-Makkī. -- 1116
